评论概述: The clasps is hard to undo
评论详情: The watch is sleek and a great dupe for the more expansive one. My only problem with it is the clasp. It’s very easy to put in but very difficult to remove it. The clasps seems to be glued lol  It’s been 4 days and I’ve tried poking the wholes and every tool bit watch clasp will not budge and watch will not come off.

A look alike due for a certain higher end brand but I didn’t want to pay $200 for the watch.  This one looks almost identical, runs well, and is a great value for the price! The sizing is nice (one size fits most) and it has gotten briefly wet like when washing hands or doing dishes and it still works great. I really recommend if you aren’t in the market for paying a lot for a simple watch, this will do the trick!
As a daycare teacher I guess it’s my fault but this did not last two weeks unfortunately. It’s a lovely watch though!!

I wanted to love this watch, and it is pretty. But about two months after I ordered it it stopped working. It runs, but right now it is four hours behind the time that it should be so it has slowed down. A watch battery for it may cost more than the actual watch, so I’m not sure what I’m going to do. I don’t feel like it was a very good purchase.

I have no complaints about this watch.  It looks just like the pictures and is comfortable.  I have small wrists so many watches are too big for me but this one has a slide adjusting band so I am able to make it is as small as I need to.  Very pretty and dainty.
I was looking for a watch with an oval face and you can read it really well it’s great quality. The size is perfect. It looks so classy and it’s a great price.
I don't know if my item is defective, but I can't get this item off my wrist. I haven't been able to contact the seller for any assistance either.

The slim and cute design adds a touch of modern minimalism that is perfect for both casual and formal occasions. The attention to detail in the design is impressive, making it a standout accessory. The watch is lightweight and comfortable to wear, making it ideal for everyday use. The quality of the materials used is evident, and the watch feels durable and well-made.

The mother-of-pearl watch face is very attractive. It is very easy to see the time.  I chose the color, "silver white". The white face is very fashionable with the silver band. This watch also has a second hand, so it would be perfect for anyone who needs to watch seconds for their job.  There is a thin piece of blue plastic covering the top of the latch. You will want to remove that prior to wearing the watch. There was also a piece of clear plastic on the band that I had to remove in order to make the band small enough to fit my wrist.  Initially, I had a little trouble getting the band small enough to fit my 5 1/2" wrist. Once I removed the clear plastic from the band, I was able to slide the clasp so it was small enough to fit me. The band will adjust to a maximum of 8".  This watch is a very good value for less than $40.00.  The watch arrives in a black box with black foam in the interior that fits the watch so it won't move in the box. This watch would make a lovely gift, and will be simple to wrap since it comes in its own box.

This watch hits far above its price range. While quite affordable, it really looks expensive and solid. A nice accessory for going out or for a casual night out. I was impressed with the design and look of the watch, very nice! The packaging is nice, appropriate for the price point, nothing too extravagant. Overall, this is a very nice watch to wear for any occasion and I find it very pretty.

I am very pleased with this Gosasa quartz watch. One look and my high-school niece was flattered and pleased at the same time! While only modestly expensive, the watch manages to convey a look of being far more costly and majestic. The clasp seems firm, timekeeping plenty accurate, thank you, and the rose color a nice touch (so they women in my life say) to how my niece carries and conducts herself.  A happy family here, thank you very much Gosasa!  An STG Synergies BTN Enterprises Review!

The oval dial, paired with a mother-of-pearl face, exudes elegance. The slim and cute design makes it a perfect accessory for any outfit, whether formal or casual. The artificial diamond accents add a touch of luxury without being overly flashy. The adjustable stainless steel mesh band is both stylish and comfortable. It fits snugly on the wrist, thanks to the sliding buckle, ensuring a perfect fit for all-day wear. With a 30m water resistance rating, this watch is suitable for everyday activities like hand washing and light rain. However, it’s best to avoid wearing it in hot water or steamy environments to maintain its longevity. This watch is incredibly versatile. Its minimalist design allows it to complement any outfit, making it a great choice for various occasions. Whether you’re heading to a business meeting or a casual outing, this watch will enhance your look.

Just what I was looking for in a watch. It’s sleek looking and just the right size, with a little sparkle. Very comfortable, easy to adjust to size, and pretty.

Classic elegant watch! What a looker! The band has a beautiful tiny beats mesh design. Unusual and yet so elegant. I am so positively surprised that the watch is 30m waterproof! No need to take on and off often.
My new favorite watch. I can see it lol
A rare color of gold which looks expensive and perfect. Fits great and dial is of big size so easy to see the time. Can be worn with any outfit.

The Gosasa Elegant Women's Quartz Watch is a stunning timepiece that combines style, functionality, and elegance. Here’s why it deserves a 5-star rating:  Design: The oval dial and slim, cute design make this watch a perfect accessory for any outfit. Its modern minimalist aesthetic is complemented by a beautiful mother-of-pearl face, adding a touch of sophistication and elegance.  Quality: The adjustable stainless steel mesh band is not only stylish but also durable and comfortable to wear. It ensures a secure fit and enhances the overall sleek look of the watch.  Functionality: This watch is 30m waterproof, making it suitable for daily wear and resistant to splashes and brief immersion in water. The quartz movement ensures accurate timekeeping, providing reliability and precision.  Versatility: The minimalist design makes this watch versatile, perfect for both casual and formal occasions. It’s an excellent choice for women who appreciate a blend of modern style and timeless elegance.  Pros:  Elegant oval dial and slim design Modern minimalist aesthetic Beautiful mother-of-pearl face Durable, adjustable stainless steel mesh band 30m waterproof Accurate quartz movement Overall, the Gosasa Elegant Women's Quartz Watch is a fantastic addition to any jewelry collection. Its stylish design, quality materials, and reliable functionality make it a must-have accessory. Highly recommended!
Just wish it was a bit bigger. But so pretty.
This is a Great Quality 👌 Beautiful 🌹 Classy Women's Watch ⌚️ I Recommend This Product 👍
This quartz watch and the gold color is very cute. I really like how delicate and elegant the design is. It is also very easy to adjust on the wrist.

This is a pretty watch, keeps time well and is comfortable to wear.  I did notice that it was running when I first opened the box--did not have that little piece of plastic holding the crown from engaging.  So who knows how long the battery will last.  And who knows if this might have been a returned item......It is not real easy to put on and clasp, as the one side of the strap has to slide in under the clasp.  The clasp itself is real tight to begin with--easy to break a fingernail trying to get it open.  But it got a little looser with use.

I'm in love with my new watch! This is so beautiful. It’s very comfortable to wear. The strap is so easy to use. The oval shape is the perfect shape and size of another way more expensive brand of this type. The strap is very secure. The stones inside are gorgeous. This came in a nice gift box. This is perfect for gifting. It’s such a wonderful value.

The oval face makes this look very modern.  Size wise it looks proportional on an average wrist.The band is not my favorite, I just don't care much for the design but it does fit and I have large wrists.  Many watches, particularly leather bands, are just too small.  At least this one is adjustable.The watch keeps time without any problem.The face is white with a slight mother of pearl look but you have to look closely to see it.The odd thing is no paperwork.  No instructions, warranty, etc.  Nothing.  The watch comes in a box with a foam cutout.

评论概述: Classic style watch but easier to read
评论详情: This is an improvement on a classic style watch and it is easy to read.  Quality materials make this a great watch, keeps time well and looks great.

I got this watch for its simplistic design and ease of use. It is an analog watch that just tells time without the date. It is easy to set the time which is great for traveling across multiple time zones.  Upon receipt, be sure to remove the plastic that covers the band. Also, there's a sticker to be removed on the underside of the watch. Finally, once you've set the time, be sure to push in the stem to get the watch running.  I have a small wrist but it is completely adjustable so it'll accommodate many sized wrists. It looks big on my wrist, but that makes it easier to read.  Review for Gosasa Elegant Women's Quartz Watch - Oval Dial, Slim & Cute, Modern Minimalist Design, 30m Waterproof, Mother-of-Pearl Face, Adjustable Stainless Steel Mesh Band Color: Rose Gold White | (B0D22HNWHY)

Nice watch! I love how it looks, especially the jewels in the place of the numbers. The band is really nice too. I like the color. It's lightweight. But this watch is very difficult to clasp, it took me multiple tries before I got it onto my wrist. But it was easy to remove.

评论概述: Attractive and Elegant Women's Quartz Watch - Oval Dial
评论详情: I purchased this stylish women's quartz watch with an oval dial for my wife, who enjoys collecting and experimenting with new timepieces. Available in three color options, we opted for Rose Gold White. This watch features an elegant oval dial with a contemporary minimalist aesthetic, emphasizing sophistication and style to complement her feminine allure.  It is made from a stainless steel woven mesh band, it provides a luxurious and comfortable wearing experience. The adjustable sliding buckle guarantees a secure fit, ensuring enduring comfort throughout the day, making it an ideal choice for both casual outings and formal occasions alike.

评论概述: Feels and looks very nice, and not too heavy
评论详情: This watch is very cute as a functional, minimalist accessory. The watch band is very nice; it is light weight, very flexible, and very durable feeling. The watch face is a little large for a smaller wrist, but it makes it easier to see the time. The watch is also accurate. The watch is listed at kind of a high price, but the quality of this watch is definitely pretty nice.

Received my wife's Gosasa Elegant Women's Quartz Watch - Oval Dial, Slim Modern Minimalist Design, 30m Waterproof, Mother-of-Pearl Face, Adjustable Stainless Steel Mesh Band in Rose this afternoon. This watch is elegant and quality made with its mother-of-pearl dial and artificial diamond accent time markers, making it easy to read. The watch came in a nice padded gift box and would make an excellent gift !! Unfortunately the watch came with no instructions or warranty information. Once you remove the watch from the box, the stainless steel band and watch back have a clear plastic coating on them which needs to be removed. Since the watch is just going into service only time will tell how reliable it is keeping time.

评论概述: Great Looking Piece, Ready to Wear
评论详情: I’ve been on a silver kick lately (I typically wear all gold), and this Gosas brand watch is a great addition to my collection. It’s sleek in appearance and has an easy to read face. It has a little bit of weight to it, but it’s definitely not heavy or cumbersome. My favorite thing about this watch is the band. There’s no need to take out any links for size adjustment. It also tucks  neatly underneath itself so the band is not jutting out. My wrist is 6.5” and thanks to the universal sizing, it fits wonderfully.
Simple is beautiful.
Perfect size and so pretty
This is a very simple, minimalist piece, so if you like very simple, yet elegant and beautiful, than this is a nice watch. Quality seems solid.

I was hoping to find a watch that I could size just right so as not to be constricting but also not slip past my wrist. Watch bands with removable links tend to be either too big or too small. This one is infinitely adjustable, and easier to put on than a traditional buckle band. Not quite as easy as an elastic band, but also more comfortable than those.  I really prize the ability of a watch to hold its time over the course of weeks and months, and I've only had this a few days so I can't report on that yet. I'll check back in a few months and let you know. So far so good.

评论概述: Nice, but dial plate design being a little bland
评论详情: This watch looked very nice in the product images. Its dial plate (hour plate) supposedly uses mother-of-pearl and has tiny cubic zirconia-like stones. But unless you take a close look, the mother-of-pearl surface is rather feature-less and looks like a plain white face. It's unfortunate.  The mesh metal band of this watch looks very well made. Since it has a sliding buckle, you can freely adjust its length around your wrist. But since it's summer, this flat metal band sticks to your sweaty wrist skin. It would be more comfortable around your wrist in fall and winter.  It's supposed to be water-resistant (with 3ATM rating), but I won't immerse it in water. Thank you for letting me share my experience with this product.

This quartz watch is gold in color, has an oval face with small crystals for the numbers, golden-colored hands, and a golden-colored clasp. The face is easy to read. There is a second hand. I found the watch band easy to adjust on my wrist.  I’m not sure if it will tarnish or not so I will be sure to take this off at night to extend its lifespan.  I would recommend this watch to anyone looking for an easy-to-read watch that looks elegant.
Quartz watch looks really nice oval type with easy secure band
Elegant looking watch. Pretty enough to wear everyday or to a special occasion. Nice soft colors. Thin band.
Beautiful color, and easy to read and check the time. The band has infinite adjustability, so it's perfect no matter what size your wrist!
Very nice watch, looks exactly like pictures.
